jcr:content.jcr:title: Babysitting Safety Class- JCS- Lake City

data.details:
Babysitting Safety- JCSA- Lake City
Grades: 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11

Whether you are getting ready to babysit in the future or have already started, this class will help you become the best babysitter you can be! This class is fun and fast paced with hands on activities, exciting video, role-plays and lively discussions. You will learn to be the best babysitter on the block! Plus you will gain the confidence to make smart decisions and stay safe in any babysitting situation. upon successful completion, you will receive official certification cards from the American Safety and Health Institute. Fun patch included.

*Designed to familiarize and to provide youth approx. ages 11 - 16 with the basic knowledge and skills needed to care for infants and children. 
*This event is for 2016 registered Girl Scouts, and registered & approved adult volunteers.
* For safety and supervision reasons, troops and individuals are not permitted to bring non-Girl Scouts or siblings. 
*Girl/adult ratios must be followed and adults are expected to stay on the premises during the event. 

$55/girl, $1/adult
Contact: Brittany McCallister 904.389.3071
